life_line.long_deep: Strong vitality, robust health, and potential for a long, energetic life. Your constitution is naturally strong.
life_line.short_clear: Intense life energy focused on quality experiences. You prefer depth over breadth in life pursuits.
life_line.broken: Significant life changes and transitions ahead. Health challenges may arise but can be overcome with care.
life_line.chained: Health fluctuations throughout life. Pay attention to stress management and regular health check-ups.
life_line.curved: Adventurous spirit with love for travel and new experiences. Life will be filled with variety and excitement.
life_line.straight: Steady, consistent life path with reliable health and energy levels.
life_line.faint: Need for greater attention to health and vitality. Lifestyle changes may be beneficial.

heart_line.long_curved: Warm, romantic nature with expressive emotions. Relationships are central to your happiness and fulfillment.
heart_line.short_straight: Reserved approach to emotions and love. Practical in relationships, taking time to open up fully.
heart_line.ends_under_index: High standards in love and relationships. Selective in choosing partners, preferring quality over quantity.
heart_line.ends_under_middle: Independent nature in relationships. Self-reliant with strong personal boundaries in love.
heart_line.broken: Emotional healing needed from past heartbreak or trauma. Growth through relationship challenges.
heart_line.chained: Complex emotional patterns. Multiple relationships or emotional complications may arise.
heart_line.deep: Intense emotional capacity with deep feelings and strong romantic connections.
heart_line.faint: More reserved emotionally. Difficulty expressing feelings openly in relationships.

head_line.long_straight: Logical, analytical thinking with excellent problem-solving abilities. Practical approach to life decisions.
head_line.long_curved: Creative intelligence combined with imaginative thinking. Innovative solutions and artistic inclinations.
head_line.short: Quick decision-making abilities. Prefer action over prolonged deliberation. Instinctive responses.
head_line.sloped: Strong creative and artistic inclinations. Intuitive problem-solving with imaginative approaches.
head_line.broken: Periods of mental growth and changing thought patterns. Evolution in thinking style throughout life.
head_line.deep: Strong mental focus and concentration abilities. Excellent memory and learning capacity.
head_line.forked: Multiple interests and talents. Ability to see different perspectives simultaneously.
head_line.chained: Scattered thinking at times. Need for focus and mental organization techniques.

fate_line.present_clear: Strong sense of purpose and destiny. Clear direction in life with predetermined path to success.
fate_line.absent: Self-made destiny with freedom from predetermined paths. Create your own opportunities and direction.
fate_line.starts_late: Late bloomer who finds major success after age 35. Patience will lead to significant achievements.
fate_line.multiple: Multiple career paths and diverse interests. Talented in various fields with changing professional focus.
fate_line.broken: Career changes and varied professional journey. Adaptability in work life with multiple transitions.
fate_line.deep: Strong career focus with unwavering professional direction. Dedicated to chosen path.
fate_line.faint: Flexible career approach. Less rigid professional structure allows for varied opportunities.
fate_line.ends_early: Early career peak or change in life direction. Major shift in priorities during middle age.

hand_shapes.square: Practical, reliable, and methodical personality. Traditional values with strong work ethic and organizational skills.
hand_shapes.pointed: Intuitive, artistic, and sensitive nature. Idealistic with strong spiritual inclinations and creative expression.
hand_shapes.spatulate: Energetic, adventurous, and innovative spirit. Active lifestyle with love for physical activities and new experiences.
hand_shapes.conic: Balanced, diplomatic, and adaptable personality. Good mediator with ability to see multiple perspectives.
hand_shapes.mixed: Complex personality combining different traits. Versatile nature with varied interests and abilities.

thumb.large: Strong willpower and leadership abilities. Determined personality with excellent self-control.
thumb.small: More collaborative approach. Prefers working with others rather than leading independently.

index.long: Natural leadership qualities and ambition. Strong desire for success and recognition.
index.short: Humble nature, prefers supporting roles. Less concerned with personal recognition or status.

middle.long: Responsible, serious nature with strong moral compass. Takes duties and obligations seriously.
middle.short: Carefree attitude with less concern for conventional responsibilities. Values freedom and spontaneity.

ring.long: Creative and artistic inclinations. Appreciation for beauty and aesthetic expression.
ring.short: More practical focus with less emphasis on artistic or creative pursuits.

pinky.long: Excellent communication skills and business acumen. Natural ability in negotiations and relationships.
pinky.short: Direct communication style. May struggle with complex negotiations or diplomatic situations.

venus.prominent: Warm, loving nature with strong appreciation for beauty and comfort. Generous and affectionate.
venus.flat: More reserved in emotional expression. Practical approach to love and relationships.

mars.prominent: Courageous and assertive nature. Natural fighter with strong determination and resilience.
mars.flat: More peaceful disposition. Prefers harmony over conflict and competition.

jupiter.prominent: Leadership abilities and ambitious nature. Natural desire for success and recognition.
jupiter.flat: More modest aspirations. Content with simpler achievements and recognition.

saturn.prominent: Serious, responsible nature with strong moral principles. Excellent planning and organizational abilities.
saturn.flat: More carefree attitude with less concern for long-term planning and conventional responsibilities.

apollo.prominent: Creative talents and artistic inclinations. Natural appreciation for beauty and aesthetic expression.
apollo.flat: More practical focus with less emphasis on artistic pursuits and creative expression.

mercury.prominent: Excellent communication skills and business sense. Natural ability in negotiations and relationships.
mercury.flat: More direct communication style. Less focus on complex business or diplomatic activities.

special_marks.star: Special talent or significant event. Indicates exceptional ability or major life occurrence in related area.
special_marks.cross: Challenge or obstacle to overcome. Difficulty in the associated life area requiring attention and effort.
special_marks.triangle: Good fortune and positive outcomes. Favorable energy and successful developments expected.
special_marks.square: Protection and stability. Indicates safety and security in challenging situations.
special_marks.island: Temporary difficulty or confusion. Period of uncertainty that will resolve with time and patience.
special_marks.chain: Multiple challenges or complex situations. Series of related difficulties requiring persistence.
special_marks.circle: Rare mark indicating special significance. Major life event or exceptional circumstance.
